thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I purchased online. The website was easy to navigate and items were easy to find. The prices were competitive. Shipping can take a while but the quicker shipping methods, at least for smaller items, aren't too expensive. There was good communication on order status. They have a good selection of some items. I would purchase from them again.
